name: Salty Seabird Bay
description:
It's golden age of piracy and somewhere on the high seas there is a legendary bay where all manner of rowdy scallywags gather to wage battle on very important pirate games: for who wins is the king of pirates and who loses is the salty seabird!



Salty Seabird Bay is the ultimate local multi-player pirate party game bonanza!



Early Access Current Features
  • Four Unique game modes
  • Race mode (championship)
  • Mermaids
  • Seven notorious pirate captains to choose from
  • Sharks
  • Multiple settings for each game mode: Modes inside game modes
  • Treasure hunting
  • Swashbuckling original soundtrack
  • Hours of crazy fun local multi-player action... It's good 'ol fun!
  • Pirate cards
  • The Kraken
  • Naval warfare action
  • Drunken Sailor

Planned For Full Release Features
  • More polished game modes and more features in them.
  • More settings for each mode
  • More notorious captains to choose from
  • Game build with the help of the players

All the game modes are easy to learn, yet have depth to be to be played for long long time!

No landlubbers allowed!
